ygData.subject: RE: Post Patch Procing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You think the adjustment Verant made to activatable items has somehow affected the proc ? I definitely noticed the delay when I activated my mask of
ygData.messageBody:
> Casting times have been implemented on several activatable items.
> This was done to correct issues that could arise from people
> chain-casting these items.

You think the adjustment Verant made to "activatable items" has somehow
affected the "proc"? I definitely noticed the delay when I activated my mask
of deception. Had to wait for a couple of seconds before the spell was cast.
I also noticed that when I moved the spell was "interrupted", but then
continued.

I thought I had a log of this, but I got lagged out and didn't reactivate it
when I came back in. :-(

Speaking of which, is it unreasonable to set our default travelling pace to
"Run" so that we don't have to turn this on whenever we log in. Does anyone
"walk" in this game? ("sneakers" don't count) This is one of the ways I
"spot a newbie" is the fact that they're walking around in the newbie
killing zones, casually sauntering around trying to catch up to things to
kill.

---Windleaf


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Stephen E. McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@...]
> Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 8:39 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Post Patch Procing
>
>
> From: "Stephen E. McCloskey" <s.mccloskey@...>
>
> Yes, I noticed it also. I was fighting for abour 2 hours
> last night and
> didn't get a single proc. I was dual weilding tentical whips
> the whole time.
>
>
> At 10:18 AM 1/21/00 -0600, you wrote:
> >From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
> >
> >
> >I'm not too concerned yet, but did anyone else playing last
> night notice a
> >staggering drop in the number of procs that their weapons
> are firing? I was
> >fighting Ogre Bouncers inside Oggok last night with my
> Ykesha and I believe
> >the number of times it fired over the course of about 4
> hours of play was
> >either 2 or 3 - that's a very serious drop, perhaps an order
> of magnitude.
> >The last hour or so I loaded up all of my DEX equipment and
> played Chant of
> >Battle and had a DEX of 186 and didn't proc once. After
> killing Bouncers I
> >ran over to Cazic-Thule and beat on some lizzies and gators
> for testing
> >purposes (also 186 DEX) and got not a single proc while
> there (around 20
> >solo kills).
> >
> >Crier Sharpsong
> >
> >
